system.description: You imbue inanimate objects with mobility and a semblance of life. Each such animated object then immediately attacks whomever or whatever you initially designate. An animated object can be of any nonmagical material. You may animate one Small or smaller object or an equivalent number of larger objects per caster level (Medium = 2, Large = 4, Huge = 8, Gargantuan = 16, Colossal = 32). You can change the designated target or targets as a move action. This spell cannot animate objects carried or worn by a creature. Animate objects can be made permanent with a permanency spell.
system.target: One Small object per caster level; see text
